name: ARPAN GUPTA
college: Dr. A.P.J. Abdul Kalam Technical University

education.school: Dr. A.P.J. Abdul Kalam Technical University

projects.name: Algo Trading App
projects.description: Engineered and launched a cutting-edge Algorithmic Trading product with real-time 100% Profit/Loss tracking. User can add upto 6 strategies at a time as per choice, and upto 10 legs per strategy.

projects.name: Go-Kart
projects.description: Engineered and implemented a robust backend system optimizing User Login/Logout and Signup processes, resulting in a 40% reduction in loading times and a 25% increase in user retention rate. Admin panel functionalities, and product registration for an E-Commerce website.

projects.name: Stack Overflow Clone
projects.description: Developed a Full-Stack website clone of Stack OverFlow. It has Login, Signup facilities. Worked on the authentication of upto 10 rounds using Bcrypt module.

experiences.description: Architected and implemented the front-end infrastructure for the organizations website and core product, leveraging cutting-edge technologies to optimize user experience, resulting in a 50% reduction in bounce rates. Spearheaded the design and development of the UI/UX utilizing a combination of FrontEnd Libraries like Material UI, Reactstrap.
Developing an authentication system of upto 12 salt rounds, implementing middleware for authentication. Connecting frontend APIs, implementing refresh token rotation along with a team of 6 interns.

full_output.name: ARPAN GUPTA
achievements_and_awards: Selected at the Regional Level for the KAVACH HACKATHON 2023 by the INDIAN GOVERNMENT.
Achieved the 9th global rank in the CodeChef Long Challenge.
